definition: Linhai county level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
to overlook the sea/on the waterfront
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
Linhai county level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
Linhai county in east Zhejiang
Seaboard Geographic Gazetteer (c. 275) by Shen Ying 沈瑩|沈莹

sentences.english: Lin Hai bridge is a cable-stayed bridge with a single pylon and one cable plane.
sentences.chinese: 临海大桥是一座独塔单索面预应力混凝土抖拉桥。

sentences.english: This year's waterfront is probably snowed again.
sentences.chinese: 今年的临海大概是又要下雪了。

sentences.english: Located in Linhai Economic Development Zone, is a combination of industry and trade company.
sentences.chinese: 座落在临海经济开发区，是一家工贸结合的公司。

sentences.english: City built 10 years ago, waterfront building into the rapid development period.
sentences.chinese: 建市十年来，临海建设进入快速发展时期。

sentences.english: It is Taozhu's Linhai Great Volcano.
sentences.chinese: 这里是桃渚的临海大火山。

sentences.english: Hebei Province is a coastal province with excellent port resources.
sentences.chinese: 河北省是一个临海大省，有着优良的港址资源。

sentences.english: The most scenic area of the harbour is on the ocean side of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 最好的景致是大桥边临海的地方。

sentences.english: Zhao Lin said she's in Linhai, maybe in Taishi.
sentences.chinese: 赵琳说她在临海，可能在台师。

sentences.english: The teahouse facing the sea is but the best place to enjoy sunset and ocean wave.
sentences.chinese: 临海的茶座，则是欣赏日落及涛声拍岸的好地方。

sentences.english: BAY SHUTTLE A free shuttle bus service system in waterfront area.
sentences.chinese: 在临海副都心有免费的往返接送巴士服务。

sentences.english: We really proud that we can offer our British friends a recidence overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们为能够安排英国朋友在临海的寓所下榻感到骄傲。

sentences.english: And king Antiochus pursued after him, and he fled along by the sea coast and came to Dora.
sentences.chinese: 安提约古王追击他，他只得逃往临海的多辣去了。

sentences.english: Terrain bully, complex topography, sea mountains, beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 地形欺负，地貌复杂，依山临海，风光秀丽。

sentences.english: It's a five-star hotel, facing the sea.
sentences.chinese: 这是香港一家临海的五星级酒店。

sentences.english: Inhabit reef flats as well as shallow lagoon and seaward reefs.
sentences.chinese: 栖息于礁石平台以及舄湖浅滩与临海礁石。

shore/seaside
